vulnerability_location.description: The public transfer function lacks any authorization checks (no owner check or modifier), allowing anyone to invoke arbitrary token transferFrom calls.
Low-level call caddress.call(...) is used without checking the return value
Unbounded loop over a dynamic array with external calls (caddress.call) may run out of gas and cause a denial of service
Floating pragma (^0.4.25) allows inconsistent compiler behavior and the low-level call (caddress.call(...)) is used without checking its return value, leading to unsafe execution.
